snippet: The New York Times stood by the preparation of an opinion piece that Roberto Zurbano wrote before being removed from his post as an editor of a Cuban publishing house.
abstract: Roberto Zurbano, editor of publishing house in Cuba who wrote critical article in New York Times opinion section about persistent racial inequality on island, something revolutionaries proudly say has lessened, has been removed from his post.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times stood by the preparation of an opinion piece that Roberto Zurbano wrote before being removed from his post as an editor of a Cuban publishing house.

headline.seo: Writer of Times Op-Ed on Racism in Cuba Loses Job
headline.main: Editor Who Wrote of Racism in Cuba Loses His Post, Colleagues Say
headline.print_headline: Editor Who Wrote of Racism in Cuba Loses His Post, Colleagues Say
